title: INDIA TODAY SAYS JAYALALITHA UPSET NEW DELHI’S PLAN TO PACIFY THE RUFFLED FEATHERS OF SRI LANKA
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The India Today magazine said Jayalalitha’s withdrawal of her nominee from the all-party parliamentary delegation to Sri Lanka has upset Prime Minister Manmohan Singh’s calculations who is bending over backwards to pacify the ruffled feathers of Sri Lanka after the vote at the UNHRC meeting in Geneva….
